message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my budget under $100. Could you consider lowering the price?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to propose a price of $110 if possible.
Hi Bob, thank you for your revised offer. I'm still a bit above your target, but I'm willing to compromise further. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $120.
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I would like to propose a final offer of $115.
Hi Bob, I understand you're getting close to your target, but I still need to get closer to my desired price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $118.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I am very close to my budget limit. I would like to propose a final offer of $116.
Hi Bob, I understand you're really close to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go below $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $119.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to propose a final offer of $117.
